From: Burton Paulu
The preliminary minutes of the St* Louis Board meeting
arrived yesterday. Here are the portions which pertain to our
special Board of Directors meeting:
"32. Executive Director*s Report. Executive
Director Skornia wasinvited to present a detailed
report on the present status of Headquarters* its
problems and development, plans for the future.
Included were such items as Headquarters space,
personnel. Inadequate finances, support, authority,
responsibility, and long range plans. This report
